description: Idea is good, but does not work on Debian 11. Running in the terminal gives the same problem in Issue #43 on the Github.

I was unable to originally get this working on 24.04.
Thanks to ubuntuhandbook it was successfully installed!
Thank you!

As posted by ubuntuhandbook: (checkout the website)

"The apt install command will install the one from Ubuntu system repository
sudo apt install gdm-settings

However, the package misses a run-time library libglib2.0-dev-bin. So, just open terminal (Ctrl+Alt+T) and run command:

sudo apt install libglib2.0-dev-bin

After that, re-launch/re-install the app and try again."
it doesn't work error with errors , what waste of time .

Insanely useful tool for a grossly underdocumented task. Everything I know about customizing GDM, I learned from GDM-Settings. Initially I used it for interactively identifying the places where changes need to made and cross-porting them into a customization package for automatic deployment onto multiple clients, but now I also liberally use it on my personal machines.
Attempting to apply setting fails every attempt, it's a good idea, but you seem to be missing some permissions for the flatpak I think.

Makes your GDM dreams come true. It works great and it's the only program that does this. If you're a stickler for having a unified look for your PC, then there's no reason not to install this. Nuff said.
Does not work.

Only a hand full of features work on Gnome46.
All of the theme options are broken.
You can copy the current display settings - that works. 
Overall its a great app just have to wait for an update to work with Gnome46.
Works like it is supposed to be on Fedora36.

The app itself could be fantastic, unfortunately after I apply any setting and log out I am greeted with an error message from GDM. The only way to fix that then is to reinstall gnome-shell. Used to work on arch with the AUR package.
summary: Good app, but destroys GDM on Fedora 36

description: Crashes gdm on boot if settings were applied. Fedora 36.
summary: Installs/runs, but cannot change settings without crash

description: Worked just fine for my fedora 36 distro when I wanted to move login screen from laptop to external monitor
summary: Worked just fine for my fedora 36 distro

description: Open the app, select your desired shell, click Apply. Wait for a few seconds. Force restart your PC.
summary: It works but it hangs the PC

description: It has just enough customisation options to help make my login screen consistent with my desktop without overwhelming the user, fantastic!
summary: Works as expected for me on fedora 36

description: Great way to customize the GNOME Shell but sadly it won't apply anymore after first time and breaks the desktop.

Tried it some time ago right before the F37 update and it used to hang the entire PC. Right now it applies whatever settings I change and asks me to reboot. 

I won't lie, those settings should be a stock thing in Gnome.
This app works on my tumbleweed system.

With this app I enabled Night Light, touchpad Tap to Click for the login screen. I like these things a lot and I enable them every time after installing a GNOME system. I have the Qwerty keyboard layout (which is the default provided by the operating system installer) and a Dvorak layout added by me. Unfortunately the login screen always chooses the Qwerty one as the first since that's the order at install time. I would like to reorder the layouts and I hope a future update would provide this. But with the current set of features I'm more than happy and it saved a lot of time.

I really love the idea but it can break GDM and at worse make login in hard as hell, at best. I used as a short cut to customise my GDM login but now have had to do it the hard way and learn how GDM work to fix the issue I had on Gnome 44. I'm on fedora 38 Beta so it could be down to a change on G44 but save yourself a head ache and learn how to do customised GDM yourself. Given it 2 stars as the idea is very good and easy to use when it worked. how ever I Manged to totally break my GDM with it and had a nightmare learning how to recover my system.
wallpaper dosent change
when i applied it and restarted the computer it still doesn't apply
I try it, but in seem to no work on Fedora 38 SilverBlue.
summary: Don't work on Fedora 38 Silver Blue

description: I wanted my display configurations to also apply to the login screen and this app solved it for me with a press of a button ("Apply current display settings" on the Displays panel)!

This software has two basic problems
GNOME regiment when applying settings
Some settings are dangerous, without writing a warning
It is also better to have a troubleshooting article or manual so that if something goes wrong it can be fixed.

I like it, it does what it says, and it fits the gnome theme! Only thing i'm missing is the ability to change keyboard layout of the login screen. Don't know if that's doable or not, but it something i'd like to be able to change
Does exactly what I need it to do and very easy to use

The button "Apply current display settings" copies your display settings to GDM. This fixed my login manager, which had a default refresh rate of 30 Hz on my screen! One click of this button, and now my login screen is a nice and smooth 60 Hz.
summary: One button makes the whole app worth it

description: It would be very nice if it could control gdm's fractional scaling and overall display scaling, as it's a pretty common thing to have to change on hidpi laptops
I mainly wanted to change the background of the login and this app has worked flawlessly for that purpose.
Funktioniert soweit, aber seitdem funktionieren die GNOME 42 Erweiterung nicht mehr! bug?
Ich habe nach einer Möglichkeit gesucht, GDM zu konfigurieren, insbesondere das Suspend- und Hibernate-Verhalten. gsettings und dconf haben nicht funktioniert. Das hier funktioniert perfekt.
Funcionó bien la primera vez, pero en las siguientes no guarda los cambios...
summary: La aplicación ha dejado de funcionar

description: Hacia mucho tiempo la tenia instalada ahora en 2023 te arma un cacao dentro si la instala así lo siento mucho fue al cubo de la basura después de estar un tiempo tratando de solucionarlo.
Cela faisait plus de 10 ans que l'accueil ne pouvait plus être personnalisé facilement. Quel bonheur ! Merci
summary: Enfin un outil simple pour personnaliser GDM!

description: Changing shell theme breaks at least screenshot tool, making it display incorrectly. In other aspects it's a good tool.
Причем система зависает насовсем, спасает только выключение питания компьютера
summary: вешает систему при попытке сменить размер курсора

description: broke login screen
Does have an option to restore GNOME's default settings. Changing a background wallpaper does not work after applying the changes
